Perfect night at the ballpark. Star Wars + baseball combines two of my favourite things, and one of my crushes complimented me on my Baby Yoda enamel pin, which I wore on my hat (inspired move, that one). 

But don‚Äôt worry, I didn‚Äôt tell her.
